title: Nangiloc-Colignan Community Tackles Salinity
creator_credit: Dept of Ag and Rural Affairs and Sunraysia Horticultural Centre
brief_description: The Nangiloc - Colignan communtiy are working together to tackle the problem of increased salinity in the soil in the Sunraysia district. Farming and irrigation go hand in hand, and with community effort, the aim is to make sure that farming practices enrich rather tahn deplete a vital resource.
